Name: Quelle Vie
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Kümmel's answer to the Stinger . To quote Harry Craddock , "Brandy gives you courage and Kümmel makes you cautious, thus giving you the perfect mixture of bravery and caution, with the bravery predominating."
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
